verses.name: Psalms 119:165
verses.text: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

verses.name: Psalms 119:166
verses.text: Lord, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:167
verses.text: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.

verses.name: Psalms 119:168
verses.text: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.

verses.name: Psalms 119:169
verses.text: Let my cry come near before thee, O Lord: give me understanding according to thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:170
verses.text: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:171
verses.text: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.
